sqlMap.statement: SELECT DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_TRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_TRK_TP_CD = #dsContrTrkTpCd# AND A.DS_CONTR_PK = #dsContrPk# ORDER BY A.STS_MEMO_UPD_TS DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_TRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_TRK_TP_CD = #dsContrTrkTpCd# AND A.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK = #dsContrDtlPk# ORDER BY A.STS_MEMO_UPD_TS DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_TRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_TRK_TP_CD = #dsContrTrkTpCd# AND A.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK = #dsContrDtlPk# AND A.DS_CONTR_BLLG_MTR_PK = #dsContrBllgMtrPk# ORDER BY A.STS_MEMO_UPD_TS DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_TRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_TRK_TP_CD = #dsContrTrkTpCd# AND A.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK = #dsContrDtlPk# AND A.CONTR_PRC_EFF_FROM_DT = #contrPrcEffFromDt# ORDER BY A.STS_MEMO_UPD_TS DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.DS_CONTR_TO_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_TRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_TRK_TP_CD = #dsContrTrkTpCd# AND A.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK = #dsContrDtlPk# AND A.DS_CONTR_BLLG_MTR_PK = #dsContrBllgMtrPk# AND A.CONTR_PRC_EFF_FROM_DT = #contrPrcEffFromDt# ORDER BY A.STS_MEMO_UPD_TS DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT A.DS_CONTR_CTRL_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_STS_V A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_PK = #dsContrPk#
SELECT A.DS_CONTR_CTRL_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_DTL_STS_V A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_DTL_PK = #dsContrDtlPk#
SELECT A.DS_CONTR_CTRL_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_BLLG_MTR_STS_V A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_BLLG_MTR_PK = #dsContrBllgMtrPk#
SELECT A.DS_CONTR_CTRL_STS_CD FROM DS_CONTR_PRC_EFF_STS_V A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.DS_CONTR_PRC_EFF_PK = #dsContrPrcEffPk#
SELECT TRIM (A.LAST_NM) || ', ' || TRIM (A.FIRST_NM) AS FULL_PSN_NM FROM AUTH_PSN A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.USR_NM = #psnCd#
